# <a name="add-emojis-or-gifs-to-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="e93fe-102">Prie pranešimų pridėti emojis arba GIF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e93fe-102">Add emojis or GIFs to messages</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e93fe-103">Atsakyti į esamą el. paštą arba pasirinkite **naujas pranešim**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e93fe-103">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e93fe-104">Pasirinkite smiley veido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e93fe-104">Select the smiley face</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e93fe-105">Norėdami atidaryti išraiškų srityje kūrimo lango apačioje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e93fe-105">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e93fe-106">Suraskite ir pasirinkite jaustukus arba GIF, kurį norite įterpti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e93fe-106">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e93fe-107">Norėdami gauti daugiau informacijos, peržiūrėkite [tinkinti el. laiško programoje "Outlook" žiniatinklyje](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e93fe-107">For more information, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
